detail_desc: Long-sleeved cardigans in a soft cotton knit with a round neck, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short skirt in an airy cotton weave with fluttery flounces and a high waist with wide smocking for a close fit. Unlined.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit, ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and fake welt back pocket.
All-in-one suit in soft sweatshirt fabric with appliqués, a jersey-lined hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Fake front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a roll-edge neckline, sewn on bow at the front, button on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Trainers with imitation leather details, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
Trousers in a soft cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and fake pockets. Jersey lining.

Knee-length dress in sturdy jersey crêpe with a collar, press-studs down the front, a chest pocket and flap front pockets. Long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and slits in the sides of the hem. Unlined.
Fitted dress in a sturdy rib knit containing some wool with a V-neck and long sleeves.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave. High waist with wide, covered elastication at the back, pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and wide legs.
Jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend containing glittery threads with long balloon sleeves with ribbing at the top and cuffs.
High-waisted jersey trousers with covered elastication at the waist and wide, flared hems.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Set with a hat, scarf and pair of gloves in a soft, fine knit. Hat with a turned-up hem. Gloves with ribbed cuffs.
Wide waist belt in hole-patterned imitation leather with a decorative bow at the front and elastication and a metal fastener at the back. Width 5 cm.
Short 5-pocket skirt in stretch, wide wale cotton corduroy with a zip fly. Unlined.
Sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pocket and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Swimsuit with a decorative bow on the shoulder straps and a lined gusset.

Blouse in woven fabric with a high, frill-trimmed smocked collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. V-shaped seam with a wide flounced trim at the front, and long sleeves with wide smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.

Parka in a cotton weave with a detachable, lined hood, embroidered motif at the top, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Decorative drawstring and adjustable elastication at the waist, front pockets, long sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Short dress in an airy weave with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck with narrow ties at the front, and a rounded hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with an all-over print, concealed press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short dress in airy, patterned crinkled fabric with a square neckline, long sleeves with gathers at the shoulders, and a smocked seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved top in striped cotton jersey with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline.
Longjohns in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and wrapover front with concealed press-stud fastening. Tie belt at the waist, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Jacquard-knit jumper in a soft modal and cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.

Jeggings in washed denim with a stretch function enabling the jeggings to hold their shape. Regular waist with covered elastication, fake front pockets, a coin pocket, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Large scarf in a patterned weave. Size 130x130 cm.
Fitted T-shirt in sturdy slub jersey.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets with a chunky metal zip and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Long-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, and two buttons at the top. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motif.

Calf-length, straight-cut dress in a crêpe weave. Round neck with an opening and covered button at the back and long sleeves with a covered button at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Loose-fit, cotton poplin shirt with a collar, dropped shoulders, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem with slits in the sides. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front, mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Flip-flops in imitation patent leather.
Jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Elasticated scrunchies in a pleated weave.
Shorts in patterned cotton poplin with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly.

Sleeveless nursing dress in chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck, decorative frill trims at the top and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Double layer at the front with deep armholes and a wrapover lining for easier nursing access. Lined.
Jumper knitted in a soft, textured wool blend with long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a rounded hem.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top, saddle shoulders and short sleeves with ribbed trims. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves with contrasting colour panels down the sides and ribbed cuffs, welt side pockets and a ribbed hem. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in an airy, textured knit with a slightly wider, roll-edge neckline and slits in the sides of the hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with contrasting colour panels down the sides, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless maxi dress in pleated jersey with a slight sheen. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover front and back, elasticated seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt. Unlined.

Sleeveless romper suit in a patterned cotton weave with two flounces at the top and a press-stud at one side. Narrow shoulder straps with elastication at the back, and elasticated hems. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (not in sizes 1-4Y).
Pyjamas with a top and leggings in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Short-sleeved top. Leggings with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Gilet in woven fabric and faux shearling with a stand-up collar and yoke in soft faux shearling for added warmth outdoors. Practical two-way zip at the front for easy access, diagonal front pockets for safe storage of valuables and an adjustable drawstring at the hem. Lined. The gilet can be worn alone or as an outer layer over other garments. Some of the polyester content of the gilet is recycled.
Baby Exclusive. Tube scarf knitted in a soft cotton and silk blend.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. Top with a lace-trimmed V-neck, and short sleeves with overlocked edges. Shorts with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.
Hats in a double layer of organic cotton jersey.

Oxford cotton shirt with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Trousers in jersey with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and straight, wide legs with sewn-in creases at the front and slits in the sides.
Sleeveless dress in satin with a scallop-edged neckline with a gentle V-shape at the back. Visible zip down the back, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined bodice.
Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
A-line blouse in woven fabric with an opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck and long trumpet sleeves.
Skinny-fit, ankle-length trousers in washed stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Sleeveless dresses in lightweight cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt. One dress has a chest pocket.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and legs with creases.
Short top in soft jersey with long sleeves.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Joggers in cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a zip at the hems.
Non-wired lace bra with moulded cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Long, sleeveless dress in an airy weave in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps. Narrow, elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.

Long dress in a patterned viscose weave with a slight sheen. Sewn-in wrapover at the top, concealed zip in one side and short sleeves with a flounced trim. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, and a wide skirt with decorative flounces. Unlined.
Jumper in an inside-out, fine-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
